# init(sectionProvider:configuration:)

**Initializer**

Creates a compositional layout object with a section provider and an additional configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(sectionProvider: @escaping NSCollectionViewCompositionalLayoutSectionProvider, configuration: NSCollectionViewCompositionalLayoutConfiguration)
```

## Creating a Layout

- **init(section:)**: Creates a compositional layout object with a single section.
- **init(section:configuration:)**: Creates a compositional layout object with a single section and an additional configuration.
- **init(sectionProvider:)**: Creates a compositional layout object with a section provider to supply the layout’s sections.
